directions: In a small saucepan bring water and sugar to a boil, stirring, and boil until sugar is completely dissolved. Cool syrup. Syrup may be made 2 weeks ahead and chilled, covered.
In a blender, blend lemon juice, 2/3 cup syrup, and mint until completely smooth and add additional syrup to taste. Lemon mixture may be made 4 hours ahead and chilled in a sealable container.
Fill 4 glasses with ice and add liquor and lemon mixture. Top off Southsides with seltzer or club soda.
ingredients: 6 ounces gin, vodka, or rum, or to taste seltzer or club soda (optional)
title: Southsides Cocktail II
